LanguageData.GatherInfo_UnavailablePawnIsIncapable: Gather info (unavailable, {0} is incapable of social interactions)
LanguageData.HighDemandQuest_LetterBody: One of your colonists found out that one of nearby settlements requires specific supplies and pays much more for them. This can be a good opportunity to make some profitable trades.\n\nCheck quest log for more info.
LanguageData.HighSupplyQuest_LetterBody: One of your colonists found out that one of nearby settlements has excess stocks which it is selling much cheaper now. This can be a good opportunity to make some profitable trades.\n\nCheck quest log for more info.
LanguageData.NoAffectingFactors: Price is not affected by any factors.
LanguageData.ToggleMiningModeCommand_Desc: Switch between light and hard mining modes.
LanguageData.PsiCoinReadyAlert_Explanation: One or more psicoins are waiting to be extracted
